attributes.action: Provide Financial support for Scout, Boys/Girls Brigade and Cadets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our Children in the technology age are missing out on community activities.
Perhaps if encouragement was given financialy to youth organisations more children might partake.
Free trips to modern activities and outward bound holidays.
With Health & Safety issues the Youth groups cannot afford to take children, especially from deprived areas.
If we want OUR COMMUNITIES back we have to build them but FINANCIAL help is needed!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
